verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:7
verses.text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil; not that we should appear approved, but that ye should do that which is honest, though we be as reprobates.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:8
verses.text: For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:9
verses.text: For we are glad, when we are weak, and ye are strong: and this also we wish, even your perfection.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 13:10
verses.text: Therefore I write these things being absent, lest being present I should use sharpness, according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification, and not to destruction.
